# dyn Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "dyn" {
  customer_name = "test"
  username      = "my-username"
  password      = "my-password"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **customer_name** (String) A Dyn customer name.
- **password** (String) The Dyn password.
- **username** (String) A Dyn username.
